20190822-117, Pts. 20, 23, 9-1-19; Ord. No. 20230831-141, Pt. 21, 9-11-23.

(A)

If an application for a preliminary plan, plat requires a variance from a subdivision
requirement, an applicant is required to obtain approval for the variance before associated
application for a preliminary plan, plat or subdivision construction plan can be approved
by the director.

(B)

The requirement of Section 25-1-214 (Public Hearing and Notice) that the Land Use Commission hold a public hearing not later than 45 days after
the date an application for a variance is filed does not apply to an application for
a variance from a subdivision requirement.

Source: Sections 13-1-481(f) and 13-1-484(c); Ord. 990225-70; Ord. 010607-8; Ord.
